item.title: Version 0.0.0
item.description:
PlunderTube 0.0.0

📥 Download

  • DMG Installer: PlunderTube.0.0.0.dmg
  • PKG Installer: PlunderTube.0.0.0.pkg

📦 What's Included

  • Audio Unit (AU) Plugin
  • VST3 Plugin
  • Standalone Application
  • Automatic Python/UV environment setup
  • FFmpeg and yt-dlp included

Minor updates and improvements.

💾 Installation

  1. Download the DMG file
  2. Open and run the PKG installer
  3. Restart your DAW if running

⚙️ System Requirements

  • macOS 14.0 or later (ARM64)
  • Compatible DAW for plugin formats

Release Type: RELEASE
